text: It is a relaxing and well-maintained place. I appreciate the guards/ fences put to guard ( as a father of an infant). It is a safe place to enjoy with your kids ( but be careful with incoming bicycles). Quite beautiful during sunsets

üåªüå∑Punggol Boardwalk is beautifully landscaped with flowering shrubs and tall trees making the area comfortably shaded

Nice place and enviroment for morning or evening stroll  or jogging or on bicycle.

Enjoy the seabreeze with your family members for family bonding.

Want to be more adventurous if only in the morning walk you can  go to Coney Island its such a lovely place to catch some anglers there doing their fishing activities.

Coney Island with many trees and natures surrounding is refreshing for the eyes.
Nice place for going on a walk. Also got northshore plaza where you can relax, eat or go to LRT( Samudra ).
